content.value:
Cyberpunk 2077 is what happens when the public demands that a game is released ASAP, even though the developer knows it isn't ready.

If you were complaining at the delays, what you have now is your own fault.
content.html: Cyberpunk 2077 is what happens when the public demands that a game is released ASAP, even though the developer knows it isn't ready. If you were complaining at the delays, what you have now is your own fault.
